title: Build a Snow Cave Shelter
brief: Construct an insulated snow cave with proper ventilation and drainage features.
steps: Step 1: Find a snow drift about 3 meters deep to dig into.
Step 2: Keep the roof arched for strength and to allow melted snow to drain down sides.
Step 3: Build sleeping platform higher than the entrance level.
Step 4: Separate sleeping platform from walls or dig small trench between platform and wall.
Step 5: Make roof high enough to sit up on sleeping platform.
Step 6: Ensure walls and ceiling are at least 30 centimeters thick.
Step 8: Block entrance with snow block, use lower area for cooking.
warnings: Takes significant time and energy to build and you will get wet during construction.
If no suitable drift available, pile snow into large mound first, then dig out.
Always ensure adequate ventilation to prevent carbon monoxide poisoning.
